Title: Green Christmas
Plot:
The firm stands to lose millions of dollars when GreenPeople threatens to sue for all the money they ever spent at Crane, Poole & Schmidt, alleging Denny misrepresented the firm as being environmentally friendly.

Alan helps Clarence take on the bank that foreclosed on his house after he made a bad deal.

Meanwhile, Tara helps Jerry overcome the grief of his breakup with Leigh, and Carl makes a decision regarding Lorraine's employment status.
Writer: Craig Turk, Sanford Golden, Karen Wyscarver, David E.
GuestStars: Sandra Colton, Paul Cassell, Hildy Brooks, Karl T. Wright, Sabrina Sloan, Nadine Ellis, Yvette Nicole Brown, Christine Dunford, Christopher Rich, Tom McGowan, Jim Antonio
